name: orella
description: This exceptional table features solid dark algarrobo wood with a polished finish, showcasing artisanal craftsmanship perfect for upscale interiors and sophisticated gatherings at home or in elegant spaces.

name: tiptoe
description: An exquisite piece crafted in lapacho wood with robust iron legs, combining rustic strength with modern lines to offer timeless elegance for both urban and country interiors.

name: varden
description: This round cherry wood table with black iron legs is designed for contemporary spaces. Its bold contrast and refined shape provide balance, beauty, and functionality in equal measure.

name: iron
description: This table combines cherry wood with black forged iron legs for a sleek industrial look. Perfect for modern dining rooms or as a stylish statement in creative studios.

name: thy
description: Rustic raw pine brings warmth and authenticity to this table, evoking simplicity and durability with a raw natural finish perfect for relaxed or earthy design environments.

name: taavi
description: Polished beech wood blends with sleek black microcement on this refined table, ideal for upscale minimal interiors or design-driven environments seeking elegance with personality.

name: sancia
description: A refined extendable table in classic mahogany wood, this piece suits both intimate dinners and large family gatherings. Its versatility is matched only by its timeless beauty.

name: mahogany
description: This black mahogany table is a bold and luxurious piece that anchors any room with sophistication. Its sturdy construction and dark finish suggest both tradition and innovation.

name: mailen
description: This large oval table in red oak combines flowing organic curves with elegant craftsmanship, offering a striking centerpiece for fine dining and entertaining with natural charm.

name: indara
description: Crafted in light cherry wood, this round table adds brightness and natural elegance to any room. A wonderful balance between simplicity, tradition, and refined modern design.

name: karsten
description: Combining raw red oak with industrial iron legs, this table stands firm in both style and function. A piece ideal for bold interiors with tactile authenticity.

name: hector
description: A raw pine and concrete hybrid table with a modern edge. Its industrial charm and strong presence make it the perfect choice for contemporary living spaces.

name: enzo
description: The Enzo table brings together polished lapacho wood and elegant forged iron details. A luxurious focal point for those who appreciate craftsmanship and rich material contrast.

name: carlhansen
description: A bright olive wood oval table with whitewashed details. It radiates warmth and freshness, perfect for Scandinavian-inspired interiors or modern rustic environments.

name: bermuda
description: Crafted in olive wood and finished in soft white tones, this piece captures coastal charm and elegant craftsmanship in a clean, understated form that invites serenity.

name: ardal
description: Dark walnut meets tempered glass in this contemporary classic. A refined table with a transparent touch, perfect for creating elegant dining moments or thoughtful workspace design.

name: memo
description: This elegant sofa features raw pine wood accents and gray fabric cushions, offering relaxed sophistication and durable design to elevate your living space with minimalist warmth and natural charm.

name: memo2
description: This cozy 2-seater sofa is crafted with grey fabric and raw pine wood for a casual, inviting presence that brings timeless comfort and practical elegance into your home environment.

name: martina
description: This luxurious sofa boasts creamy sheepskin upholstery and a fluffy texture, bringing warmth, softness, and irresistible charm into stylish interiors designed for indulgent relaxation and contemporary aesthetics.

name: kumo
description: A masterpiece of refined utility, this greige Aquaclean fabric sofa with forged iron structure invites elegance, comfort, and smart maintenance into modern spaces with understated sophistication.

name: jessa
description: This bold red velvet sofa with light beech wood base invites attention and admiration, combining retro flair with the comfort and quality of masterful craftsmanship and modern living.

name: frenddi
description: Wrapped in soft beige microfiber and supported by warm walnut legs, this sofa offers an inviting design that prioritizes durability, style, and everyday lounging with modern elegance.

name: sumo
description: An extravagant piece with blush pink leather and fluffy lines, this sofa is made for bold interiors where comfort meets luxury in soft, sculptural sophistication and standout form.

name: minotti
description: This modular beige velvet and linen sofa adapts effortlessly to elegant spaces, blending natural fibers and rich textures for comfort and flexibility without compromising elevated aesthetics.

name: ellie
description: A stunning dark beige velvet 2-seater that exudes softness and comfort, Ellie is crafted for those who desire subtle opulence in a compact, cozy and curated piece.

name: shova
description: Finished in rich reddish-orange suede, this modular 2-seater sofa adds a sophisticated twist of color and texture, creating a stylish and versatile seating solution for bold interiors.

name: corda
description: Wrapped in light blue suede, Corda is an effortlessly stylish modular sofa offering clean lines, soft touch, and adaptable comfort for refined modern homes and expressive ambiances.

name: carlotta
description: Carlotta blends beige linen with subtle wood legs in a classic design that emphasizes comfort, breathability, and the relaxed charm of Mediterranean-inspired interiors with modern lines.

name: campo
description: Campo brings together Aquaclean grey fabric and plush cushioning in a durable, family-friendly sofa that effortlessly elevates daily lounging with resilient beauty and minimalist aesthetic appeal.

name: beige_2seater
description: This beige 2-seater velvet sofa introduces tactile luxury and soft elegance, enhancing modern interiors with compact proportions and a cozy retreat of comfort and visual refinement.

name: beige_3seater
description: This beige velvet 3-seater sofa is a sophisticated staple offering generous seating, classic texture, and seamless integration into refined living rooms and stylish spaces of distinction.

name: soro
description: This designer chair features a beech wood frame and soft velvet upholstery, blending comfort and elegance for luxurious modern dining spaces or home offices.

name: zahara
description: An authentic piece with warm brown genuine leather and sleek lines. This chair adds rich sophistication to any elegant dining or professional setting.

name: nina
description: Crafted from solid eucalyptus wood, this minimalist chair merges durability and timeless design, perfect for natural-style interiors or warm rustic spaces.

name: beige_corduroy
description: This cherry wood chair with beige corduroy upholstery brings mid-century charm and cozy texture into contemporary living or lounge environments.

name: beige_chenille
description: An elegant blend of soft chenille fabric and sculptural design. This chair adds texture, charm, and comfort to both formal and relaxed interiors.

name: konna
description: This teak wood chair with green velvet seat delivers a perfect mix of earthy sophistication and plush seating for dining or reading corners.

name: chenille_3legs
description: A bold piece featuring dark walnut wood, soft chenille fabric and a unique three-leg design, merging balance and artistic expression.

name: marchin
description: An exquisite chair with swivel base, green chenille, and oak structure. Perfect for creative spaces where comfort and elegance intertwine.

name: fondes
description: A solid English oak chair with a timeless design. Its grain-rich finish and ergonomic backrest make it a standout in refined interiors.

name: aniella
description: A luxurious piece with black forged iron legs and fluffy sheepskin cover, designed for premium lounge areas and modern design lovers.

name: normann
description: Ebony wood in a raw matte finish defines this sleek minimalist chair that fits seamlessly into Nordic and industrial-inspired interiors.

name: lanson
description: Smoked cedar gives this chair an earthy aroma and deep grain tone. A unique find for interiors that celebrate natural warmth.

name: karsten_iron
description: Danish oak and iron converge in this ultra-modern chair. With bold contrast and comfort, it invites admiration and conversation in any setting.

name: swivel_oak
description: Featuring a natural oak build and minimalist swivel seat, this chair is both striking and practical for evolving contemporary interiors.

name: cedar_chenille
description: Combining raw cedar structure and plush chenille seating, this piece radiates elegance while maintaining strong natural warmth and character.

name: cord
description: This wooden chair features an artisanal cord weave seat, bringing relaxed rustic refinement to eclectic kitchens and breezy verandas alike.
